summary: My first mod, made while create dungeon tutorial, instead of clutter I added man-cave swag and half naked women...
descriptionHtml:
Hi All,

I made this mod for fun, mostly using vanilla items aside from Armour/outfits and idle animation. The labeling is designed to be easy to read/changed for private use and basically a good reference point for new modders like myself trying to get some ideas.

Please let me know if you got any ideas/request to make more mancave swag.

###Location###
Across the river from riverwood south westerly, big ugly rock entrance, cant miss it...

###Contents###
Main Hall
Strip Club
Mini Hroki Testing Lab


###Coming as soon as I learn how###
- More mancave swag
- Custom animations
- Training room
- Custom Armours/Body Types
- Independent mod (non referenced)

###Mods Used###
Apachii SKyhair - ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_4 - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

Armour Mods Used
Kaw Cat Disguise Set - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6150/?
Ligerie Set -CBBE 3_2 by Nausicaa - main - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28714/?
Demon Hunter Armour - CBBEv3 and UNP - Demon Hunter - CBBEv3 - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27060/?
Seraphine Armour -CBBEv3 - UNP - Seraphine - CBBEv3 - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24723/?

Note: Disabled in this version while asking for permission
TAKE NEW SLOT Glasses Ears Earring everything in accessories - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11068/?
Selene - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48077/?

Animation Mod for Dancers
>>>recommended<<< for the dancers
Dance Animation for modder > Sexy > BellyDancing (Recommended) - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2658/?
CBBE mods or replace/disable armour mods and set your own...


###Inspiration###
ASX
Evil Lair of Hydra
Generic Skyrim shops and dungeons

###Notes###
- Basically a combination of skin tight clothing with moe glasses, cat tail, cat ear girls.
- The girls in the back main hall in captive bound position I haven't got around to animation, later should be cleaning, drinking, and doing the whole penguin slide game thing where they go upstairs and jump off the board into the pool and repeat
- Dancers in the wall viewers wont dance unless you install the animation mod for dancers (instructions in the mod itself, put desired file in folder, rename to mt_idle.hkx)
- The catwalk girls in theory shouldn't be going on breaks or going off the catwalk if I navmeshed it right. Should be walking in slow motion baywatch style. If not save before entering the mancave then reload.
- NPC 'Sexy' is an actual follower, and a merchant (i set range to 999 or something) so in theory she'll still buy/sell stuff anywhere in skyrim. Shes 1.3 height and 125 speed, any faster she'll punch out an entire fort before you'd draw an arrow..
- Anyone know of any diving suit mods? there was suppose to be a mini hroki in (selene outfit, looks like scoober outfit miniturised) with a snorkel, flippers, and trident in the fishtank for the lol...
- If you do not install any of the Armour mods it shouldn't crash skyrim, they'll just be floating heads with invisible outfits which is hilarious
author: lolotech
